info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 1:23AM CDT until July 01 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Macoupin County in southwestern Illinois... Northwestern Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 123 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Girard, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Virden, Girard, White Oak, Farmersville, Waggoner, Nilwood, Harvel, and Standard City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
